welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Brockville, a charming city nestled along the beautiful St. Lawrence River. Known for its rich history, scenic views, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brockville Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Brockville Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ogdensburg Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Ogdensburg Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Smith Falls Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Smith Falls Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.
